faq_items.question: What exactly is included in Docsie's Black Friday deal and how much can I save?
faq_items.answer: Docsie's Black Friday deal offers up to 50% off for 3 years on annual subscription plans using promo code BLACKFRIDAY2023. The discount applies to signups and demo requests made between November 8, 2023, and December 10, 2023. To get the full 3-year discount, you'll need to make an upfront payment for the multi-year deal.

faq_items.question: How does Docsie's AI-driven platform improve documentation management compared to traditional tools?
faq_items.answer: Docsie combines AI-powered features with collaborative tools, knowledge portals, and an online markdown editor to streamline the entire documentation process. Unlike traditional tools, it enables you to publish interactive knowledge portals, gather actionable insights and feedback, and manage documentation for multiple products from a single platform. This makes writing, editing, and publishing significantly easier while enabling better stakeholder collaboration.

faq_items.question: Can I use this Black Friday discount for monthly plans or add-ons?
faq_items.answer: No, the Black Friday discount exclusively applies to annual subscription plans for Docsie's SaaS platform only. The discount does not apply to monthly plans or any add-ons. After your discounted period ends, your subscription will automatically renew at regular pricing.

faq_items.question: What happens after my 3-year discounted period ends with Docsie?
faq_items.answer: After your agreed discount tenure (whether annual or the 3-year multi-year plan), your Docsie subscription will automatically renew at the regular price. The platform will continue to provide the same AI-driven documentation features, collaborative tools, and knowledge portal capabilities you've been using.

faq_items.question: What key features make Docsie suitable for technical teams managing multiple product documentations?
faq_items.answer: Docsie offers streamlined documentation management for multiple products through its collaborative platform with knowledge portals and markdown editor. Technical teams benefit from interactive knowledge portal publishing, actionable insights and feedback collection, and seamless stakeholder collaboration. These features make complex documentation tasks more manageable while ensuring better product documentation quality.
